name: Dome Base 64 (C64)
description:
A Game for TheC64Maxi/C64Mini/Commodore 64 or a Good C64 Emulator.

1 Player Game, Arcade Style Push Scroll Shoot 'em Up.

Made with Shoot 'Em' Up Construction Kit by Sensible Software and Side Scroll Version by Jon Wells, Seuck framework Code by Richard Bayliss.

Features Hi-Rez 2 Colour and Low-Rez Multi Colour Tile Maps, Sprites that may look familiar and Extra Sound FX.
